name: rk-phase-1-group-project
description: Rick and Morty-themed webapp to demonstrate calling an api that fetches character data from a local server and dynamically populates the interface with information about each variety of Rick.  The app allows users to select from a dropdown menu, view their details on the left and right side of the interface, and see the character's image in the center of the page.  Users can also like a character, with the like count updating with each click.
